announcements.title: Were it so easy..
announcements.subtitle: Halo 3 Campaign
announcements.content:
'The Halo 3 Campaign Finally Made It's Way Into ELDewrito Thanks To Our Many Modders!'
Now You Can Relive The Amazingness Of Playing 4 Player With Friends Like
You Used To! I Hope This Will Be A Wonderful Experience!
- blam yee/blam
